revised_title: Henri Lebesgue: A Pioneer of Modern Analysis
tldr: Henri Lebesgue was a French mathematician who made significant contributions to the field of mathematical analysis. He introduced the Lebesgue integral, a more powerful tool than the Riemann integral, and developed the theory of measure. Lebesgue also worked on trigonometric series, convergence problems, and potential theory, leaving a lasting impact on the field of mathematics.
